description.items: An nested array of items containing: id, label, active, ancestor, children(bool = async loading, or array), href, style, class, and color (which overrides the color settings). Attribute list may also contain 'data-fetch-url' to enable asyncrounous fetching.
description.direction: Modifier for basic direction. Accept values: 'vertical', 'horizontal.'
description.includeToggle: Tells wheter to include toggle button to expand childs or not. Accept values: true, false.
description.allowStyle: Allow the use of style parameter in this menu (item.style = 'button')
description.buttonStyle: If the nav is presenting buttons, what style they should be in.
description.buttonColor: If the nav is presenting buttons, what color they should be in.
description.expandLabel: Prefix for labels on expand arrow. Will result in Expand: Link label, or if label is missing, just Expand.
description.height: The default height of the menu (only supports horizontal navigation). Values: sm, md, lg.
description.compressed: Makes the spacing between items smaller and the overall navigation more compressed.
description.expandIcon: The icon to use for the expand button. Accepts any icon name from the icon library or svg.
description.indentSubLevels: If true, sublevels will be indented.
